// å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ³›å‹ç±»
class Box<T> {
    private T value;
    
    public void set(T value) {
        this.value = value;
    }
    
    public T get() {
        return value;
    }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
Box<String> stringBox = new Box<>();
stringBox.set("Hello");
String value = stringBox.get(); // ä¸éœ€è¦ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢

public interface Comparable<T> { int compareTo(T o); }
public class Integer implements Comparable<Integer> {
    // ç¼–è¯‘å™¨ç”Ÿæˆæ¡¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼špublic int compareTo(Object o) { return compareTo((Integer)o); }
}

è¿™ç§æœºåˆ¶ç¡®ä¿äº†ç±»å‹ç³»ç»Ÿçš„ä¸€è‡´æ€§ï¼Œä½†ä»£ä»·æ˜¯è¿è¡Œæ—¶æ— æ³•é€šè¿‡åå°„ç›´æ¥è·å–æ³›å‹å‚æ•°ç±»å‹ã€‚

ä¸‰ã€PECSåŸåˆ™çš„ç±»å‹è®ºåŸºç¡€ä¸å¤æ‚åº”ç”¨æ¡ˆä¾‹

PECSï¼ˆProducer Extends, Consumer Superï¼‰åŸåˆ™çš„æ•°å­¦åŸºç¡€æºäºå‹å˜ï¼ˆVarianceï¼‰ç†è®ºï¼š

  • åå˜ï¼ˆCovarianceï¼‰ï¼š<? extends T>å…è®¸ç”Ÿäº§è€…æä¾›Tæˆ–å…¶å­ç±»ã€‚

å¤æ‚åµŒå¥—æ³›å‹æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼š

  1. ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨çš„é›†åˆå¤åˆ¶ï¼šJDKçš„Collections.copyæ–¹æ³•é€šè¿‡List<? super T>å’ŒList<? extends T>å®ç°å®‰å…¨æ‹·è´ï¼š
public static <T> void copy(List<? super T> dest, List<? extends T> src) {
    for (int i=0; i<srcSize; i++) dest.set(i, src.get(i));
}
  1. åµŒå¥—é€šé…ç¬¦çš„æµå¤„ç†ï¼šæ„å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå¤„ç†List<List<? extends Number>>çš„æµæ°´çº¿ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§æ•°å€¼ç±»å‹ï¼š
public <T extends Number> void processNestedList(List<List<? extends T>> lists) {
    lists.stream().flatMap(List::stream).mapToDouble(Number::doubleValue).sum();
}

@Benchmark
public void genericMethod(Blackhole bh) {
    List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();
    list.add(1);
    bh.consume(list.get(0)); // å¼ºåˆ¶ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢
}

@Benchmark
public void rawTypeMethod(Blackhole bh) {
    List list = new ArrayList();
    list.add(1);
    bh.consume((Integer) list.get(0));
}

æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœæ˜¾ç¤ºï¼Œæ³›å‹ä»£ç çš„æ€§èƒ½æŸè€—ä¸»è¦æ¥è‡ªå¼ºåˆ¶ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢ï¼Œä¸éæ³›å‹ä»£ç å·®å¼‚åœ¨5%ä»¥å†…ï¼ˆå…·ä½“æ•°å€¼éœ€å®æµ‹ï¼‰ã€‚

å…«ã€å¤æ‚æ³›å‹å·¥å‚æ¨¡å¼è®¾è®¡ç¤ºä¾‹

ä»¥ä¸‹å·¥å‚æ¨¡å¼ç»“åˆé€’å½’ç±»å‹è¾¹ç•Œä¸äº¤å‰ç±»å‹ï¼š

interface Factory<T extends Factory<T>> {
    T create();
}

interface Logger {
    void log(String message);
}

class AdvancedLoggerFactory implements Factory<AdvancedLoggerFactory>, Logger {
    @Override
    public AdvancedLoggerFactory create() { return new AdvancedLoggerFactory(); }
    @Override
    public void log(String message) { System.out.println(message); }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨äº¤å‰ç±»å‹
<T extends Factory<T> & Logger> void process(T factory) {
    factory.create().log("Created new instance");
}

è¯¥è®¾è®¡é€šè¿‡T extends Factory<T>å®ç°é€’å½’ç±»å‹é“¾ï¼Œå¹¶é€šè¿‡äº¤å‰ç±»å‹& Loggerç»„åˆå¤šä¸ªæ¥å£èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚
